title: BUA of staircase, lift &lift lobby and BUA permissible free of FSI as per the provisions of Regulation no 31(1) shall not be counted in BUA to be handed over to MCGM and the same shall be without charging premium for the provision of built up amenity under AR
clause_text: BUA of staircase, lift &lift lobby and BUA permissible free of FSI as per the provisions of Regulation no 31(1) shall not be counted in BUA to be handed over to MCGM and the same shall be without charging premium for the provision of built up amenity under AR.
